thread.title: Webb May Run As an Independent
thread.title_full: Webb May Run As an Independent

author: Taegan Goddard
title: Webb May Run As an Independent
text:
Webb May Run As an Independent October 19, 2015 By Taegan Goddard 0 Comments 
Former Sen. Jim Webb, who complained of not getting enough time to talk at last week’s debate and said it was “ rigged ,” is considering running as an independent, the New York Times reports. 
Webb’s campaign says he will hold a 1 p.m. news conference on Tuesday to “discuss his candidacy, the campaign and his views of the political parties in the current election cycle.” Related Posts Never miss a Political Wire post Your email address: * Please enter all required fields Correct invalid entries
